metadata.title: CVE-2024-50305 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Valid Host header field can cause Apache Traffic Server to crash on someplatforms.This issue affects Apache Traffic Server: from 9.2.0 through 9.2.5.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 9.2.6, which fixes the issue,or 10.0.2, which does not have the issue.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
